alert.note: Alert for Tate; Tunica (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 12 at 7:19AM CST until January 12 at 7:45AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 AM CST FOR DESOTO...NORTHEASTERN TUNICA...NORTHWESTERN TATE AND EASTERN SHELBY COUNTIES... At 718 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Meeman Shelby Forest State Park to near Little Texas, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Bartlett, Southaven, Germantown, Olive Branch, Horn Lake, Hernando, Millington, Cordova, Memphis, Lakeland, Arlington, Coldwater, Walls, Lake Cormorant, Ellendale, Eudora, Lewisburg, Arkabutla, Lynchburg, and Phillipp. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM CST for northwestern Mississippi...and west Tennessee. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
